metadata.title: CVE-2013-1800 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The crack gem 0.3.1 and earlier for Ruby does not properly restrict castsof string values, which might allow remote attackers to conductobject-injection attacks and execute arbitrary code, or cause a denial ofservice (memory and CPU consumption) by leveraging Action Pack support for(1) YAML type conversion or (2) Symbol type conversion, a similarvulnerability to CVE-2013-0156.

criterions.comment: ruby-crack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
